headline: S&P Global to Present at Goldman Sachs 2025 Financial Services Conference on December 9, 2025
summary: Martina Cheung, President and Chief Executive Officer of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), will participate in Goldman Sachs' 2025 Financial Services Conference on December 9, 2025 in New York, New York. Ms. Cheung is scheduled to speak from 12:20 p.m. to 12:55 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time). The "fireside chat" will be webcast and may include forward-looking information. Eric Aboaf, Chief Financial Officer and Mark Grant, Senior Vice President of Investor Relations and Treasurer, will join for investor me
